bike.description: Handcrafted with light, durable, American True-Temper chromoly-steel •Shimano Alfine 8 or 11-speed shifting •FSA Gimondi crankset •Velo-Orange fenders •Velo-Orange handmade chaincase •Velo-Orange Leather Saddle •Natural Cork grips •Tektro caliper brakes •Alloy wheelset •Painted Front basket •Schwalbe Delta Cruiser tires with K-Guard®
